sentences.en: After we corral the horses we'll have lunch.
sentences.cn: 把马关进围栏后,我们就吃中饭.

sentences.en: But email is too widely distributed to corral into a any kind of structure now.
sentences.cn: 但是电子邮件的使用分布非常广泛,目前不可能统一为任何一种结构.

sentences.en: Decreased spending at places like Golden Corral has gone straight to the county budget's bottom line.
sentences.cn: 居民削减支出已经直接威胁到了县财政收入.

sentences.en: I took it outside and laid it on rail of the corral fence.
sentences.cn: 我把它拿到外面,搁在牛厩篱笆下面的横栏上.

sentences.en: If you are trying to think of new ideas, corral your pal as a sounding board.
sentences.cn: 如果你在尝试构思一些新的想法, 与你的好友围在一起,你会和他们产生共鸣和激荡的.

sentences.en: The cowboys have returned and we find ourselves back at the OK Corral.
sentences.cn: 牛仔又回来了,我们回到了俄克拉荷马州的畜栏之中.

sentences.en: The cowboys rounded up the steers and herded them into a corral.
sentences.cn: 牛仔们将小牛赶拢,并将它们拦起来.

sentences.en: The kids were kept in the small corral.
The report of the gun stampeded the cattle and sent them milling about in the corral.
sentences.cn: 这一声枪响惊得牛群在畜栏内乱跑乱转.

sentences.en: They corralled the cattle before loading them onto the truck.
sentences.cn: 他们在把牛装上车以前，先把牛赶入了畜栏。

sentences.en: They drove the ponies into a corral.
sentences.cn: 他们把矮种马赶进了畜栏。

sentences.en: We built huge fires the corral and filled our house the dying sheep and goats.
sentences.cn: 我们在畜栏建立了巨大的火并且用死的绵羊和山羊填装了我们的房子.

trans.tran_en: a fairly small enclosed area where cattle, horses etc can be kept temporarily, especially in North America

trans.tran_cn: 把…关进畜栏；捕捉；把…布成车阵
trans.tran_en: to make animals move into a corral
